Class Battlefield

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Battlefield
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable, GameConstants
    The Battlefield class renders all the graphics

    1.0
    Author:
    Teodor Merodiyski

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     java.net.URISyntaxException
        invoked when the cannon of the player was destroyed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the file "scores.inc"
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if there is a problem with the file "scores.inc"

      • animationCycle

        public void animationCycle()
        This method is called constantly to do the animation. Checks for destruction of the cannon, counts the kills, moves the objects on the screen.
